Class PatientAppointmentDB

java.lang.Object
sc2002.repositories.PatientAppointmentDB
public class PatientAppointmentDB extends Object
The PatientAppointmentDB class handles appointment scheduling and rescheduling for patients, including fetching available slots and updating the database.

    • getAvailableSlots

      public static List<AvailableDatesToChoose> getAvailableSlots() throws IOException
      Retrieves the list of available appointment slots.
      Returns:
      a list of available dates to choose from
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

    • patientScheduledAppointments

      public static List<PatientScheduledAppointment> patientScheduledAppointments(String patientID) throws IOException
      Fetches the list of scheduled appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient
      Returns:
      a list of scheduled appointments for the patient
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

    • reschedulePatientAppointment

      public static void reschedulePatientAppointment(int appointmentID, String patientID) throws IOException
      Reschedules a patient's appointment by updating the status to "Available".
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the appointment ID to reschedule
      patientID - the patient ID associated with the appointment
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while updating the file

    • updateScheduleForPatients

      public static void updateScheduleForPatients(int appointmentID, String patientID) throws IOException
      Updates an appointment status for a patient to "Pending".
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the appointment ID to schedule
      patientID - the patient ID associated with the appointment
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while updating the file
